description:
Don’t be a T.O.O.L… Enlist with the GUN BROS today!

Help to protect the cosmos from the Tyrannical Oppressors of Life known as T.O.O.L. The evil T.O.O.L organisation has grown from the underworld to spread its own brand of malevolent funk to every corner of the galaxy. Most recently, they’ve set their sights on harvesting the rare element Xplodium in an effort to create even more powerful weapons to enslave the universe… But not if the GUN BROS have anything to do about it!

• Tons of insanely powerful Guns, armour and other explosive power-ups to get your hands on in the F.R.A.G.G.E.D Armoury.
• Use out-of-this-world shooting skills to take down waves of T.O.O.L enemies!
• Fight legions of evil T.O.O.L. minions – they’re expendable but tough!
• Use SMARTillery items like the AIRSTRIKE to gain the upper hand in battle
